abstract: Arthur Dubin, leading historian of golden age of American passenger railroads, dies at age 88.
snippet: Mr. Dubin, an architect, became fascinated by trains as a child and went on to write two of the best-known works on American passenger railroads.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Dubin, an architect, became fascinated by trains as a child and went on to write two of the best-known works on American passenger railroads.

headline.main: Arthur Dubin, Historian of Railroad’s Golden Era, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Arthur Dubin, 88, Historian of the Rails
